ValidationRule.description: Once a TID Type has been set it cannot be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (TID_Type__c), "BMS"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (TID_Type__c), "BMS + DCC")), ISCHANGED(TID_Type__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once a Terminal ID has been assigned you may not change the TID Type field.
